title: Mental Health Screening App for Adolescents and PwDs
description: Develop an Android-based application to screen for potential mental health issues in adolescents and Persons with Disabilities (PwDs).

title: App for Assessing Specific Learning Disabilities
description: Design an Android-based application to assess reading and writing difficulties in persons with specific learning disabilities in a simplified way.

title: Gamified Platform for Children's Rights Awareness
description: Create a web app to gamify learning about children’s rights, increasing legal literacy among children in India.

title: Real-Time Street Parking Management System
description: Develop a cloud-based solution for smart, real-time management of street parking, optimizing parking spaces and user convenience.

title: Handwritten Text Analyzer and Converter
description: Build an Android-based application to analyze handwritten text and convert it into editable digital text.

title: Accessible Buildings and Public Spaces Platform
description: Create a web app to store and share information about accessible buildings and public spaces for improved inclusivity.

title: Water Supply Inspection and Analysis Tool
description: Build a cloud-based solution for comprehensive inspection and analysis of water supply distribution lines.

title: Speech-to-Text Transcription for Indian Languages
description: Develop a web app to transcribe speech in Indian languages into native script and English text.

title: Women’s Safety Monitoring Tool
description: Design an Android-based application for community-based reporting and monitoring of women’s safety in colleges and universities.

title: Water Problem Crowdsourcing App
description: Create an Android-based application that crowdsources water-related problems, open-sources the data, and visualizes issues on a map.

title: Platform for Budding Entrepreneurs
description: Develop a cloud-based platform to support and guide budding entrepreneurs by providing mentorship and resources.

title: IP Awareness Gaming Software
description: Create a web app with interactive games to teach Intellectual Property rights to school students.

title: Real-Time Rescue Agency Tracker
description: Build an Android-based application to register rescue agencies and display their real-time locations during disasters.

title: Disaster Awareness and Preparedness Tools
description: Create a web app with tools to raise awareness and improve preparedness for disaster management among communities.

title: Tour Guide App for Char Dham Yatra
description: Develop an Android-based application to guide tourists visiting Char Dham and other locations in Uttarakhand.

title: Plant Disease Identification App
description: Design an Android-based application to identify and suggest solutions for diseases in plants and crops.

title: Dairy Farmer Registration Platform
description: Build a web app to facilitate online registration and processing for dairy farmers producing milk and livestock products.

title: Real-Time Vehicle Tracking System
description: Create a cloud-based solution for tracking vehicles in real-time for better fleet management.

title: Ticketless Entry System for Monuments
description: Design a web app for managing ticketless entry to monuments and museums for a seamless experience.

title: Language Translation for Railway Announcements
description: Develop a cloud-based system for natural language translation of railway announcements into multiple Indian languages.
